description:
The wasteland gets deadly.
In this intense Fallout Season 2 (2025) clip, The Ghoul faces off against a terrifying Radscorpion in a brutal fight for survival. Set in the harsh post-apocalyptic world of Fallout, this scene delivers savage combat, raw tension, and stunning creature action straight from the wasteland.

Watch the full Ghoul vs Radscorpion fight scene in crisp 4K, showcasing the danger, violence, and dark atmosphere that define Fallout’s unforgiving universe.
